extendedInfo.description: Browse over 6000 drink recipes. Save drinks as favorites, save ingredients to "My Bar" and search by name, type, ingredient and alcohol type. Create an account and have your Favorites and My Bar synced to "the cloud."Now more social! Find other users and add them as your friends. Share ratings, favorites and check-ins. Check-in to any drink and let your friends know where you are.Push notifications for new additions to favorites, My Bar, offline drinks and Friend Requests.* Permissions *This application uses Google's C2DM (Cloud 2 Device Messaging) which is why it requires access to your accounts. This is only used for registering with C2DM and doesn't have access to passwords. If you don't want to allow this access, don't setup device messaging.Your location is used for getting a list of nearby places when checking in to a drink. It is only used for this and nothing about your location is stored. If you don't want to use this feature then don't check-in to a drink.If you have any issues/concerns about the permissions this application uses, please contact us.Features:* Browse by letter* Browse by name* Browse by type* View Top 10 rated drinks* View 10 Newest drinks* Search* Add friends and check-in to drinks* Save favorites* Save ingredient to My Bar* Save drinks for offline viewing* Support for tablets and Google TV (beta)Free version is ad supported with an in-app purchase to remove them available in the Settings section of the application (beta).Please contact support@drinktothis.com with any questions/suggestions.

reviews.title: OK, but
reviews.comment: What\'s the point of my bar if you can\'t list the drinks you can make with what you have? Sgs2 2.3.4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Be nice if I could look at the drinks instead of looking for them
reviews.author: A Google User
